com.google.wave.api
Class Annotation

java.lang.Object
  com.google.wave.api.Annotation

public class Annotation
extends java.lang.Object

Annotation is an immutable key-value pair of metadata over a range of content. Annotation can be used to store data or to be interpreted by a client when displaying the data. Example uses of annotation include styling text, supplying spelling corrections, and links to refer that area of text to another document or web site.

shift

public void shift(int position,
                  int shiftAmount)
